name: Kyle's Birthday Bash
description:
. . .

It is your birthday and you are peacefully enjoying some PoE grinding.

You got this   amazing cake   just waiting to be eaten except . . . 

YOUR FRIENDS HAVE BECOME OBSESSED AND POSSESSED!


. . .

Suddenly, hordes of undead have come to eat your   delicious cake. 

You must stop at nothing to defend that   magnificent birthday cake   . . .

. . . even a pump-action-shotgun if you must!

 

. . .   GOOD  LUCK   . . .
